### [Shiny in production: Principles, practices, and tools - Joe Cheng](https://resources.rstudio.com/rstudio-conf-2019/shiny-in-production-principles-practices-and-tools-joe-cheng)

can shiny be used for production?

- 2015 answer:Yes,its quite possible

- 2019 answer:Yes,its quite esay

challenges for shiny in production:cultural/Organizational/Technical

New tools for shiny:shinytest/shinyloadtest/profvis/plot caching/Async

1.use shinyloadtest to see if its fast
2.if not,use profvis to see whats making it slow
3.Optimize
- move work out of Shiny
- make code faster
- use caching
- use async
